mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sale(name, price, progress, userid, customerid, customername, username, lasttime, successtime) VALUES (#{name},#{price},#{progress},#{userid},#{customerid},#{customername},#{username},#{lasttime},#{successtime})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sale set progress = #{progress},lasttime = #{lasttime},successtime = #{successtime} where id = #{id}
